title: APT Rises 2.3%, Outperforms Wider Crypto Market
contentSnippet: The gains were accompanied by a surge in trading volume signaling potential institutional positioning.

title: Privacy Coins Lose Steam as ZCash, Monero, and Dash Follow Crypto Market Pullback
contentSnippet: Privacy coins like ZCash and Monero dropped as analysts say the "safe haven" narrative has broken, tying their fate to Bitcoin's cycles.

title: Cango posts 60% Q3 revenue jump as bitcoin mining output climbs
contentSnippet: The company's pivot into bitcoin mining and its new AI compute roadmap reflect a year of operational restructuring.

title: On Thin Ice: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 2, 2025

title: Poland's President Vetoes MiCA Bill, Cites Threats to 'Freedoms of Poles'
contentSnippet: President Karol Narwocki was concerned that the Cryptoasset Market Act would allow the government to disable crypto companies websites "with a single click."

title: Myriad Partners With Trust Wallet to Launch First In-Wallet Prediction Markets
contentSnippet: Trust Wallet’s self-custody Web3 wallet is the first to natively integrate prediction markets in a “single, streamlined experience.”

title: Crypto Markets Today: Risk-Off Mood Persists as Altcoins Extend Losses
contentSnippet: Crypto markets failed to bounce on Tuesday, with bitcoin retracing last week’s gains and altcoins extending losses.

title: Goldman's $2B ETF Issuer Takeover Is Both a Blessing and a Curse for Crypto
contentSnippet: Although the acquisition of Innovator Capital Management does not directly mention crypto, it does inherently imply that Goldman Sachs is expanding into the digital assets arena.

title: BlackRock’s Larry Fink and Rob Goldstein say tokenization could do for finance what the early internet did for information
contentSnippet: The executives pointed to a 300% surge in real-world asset tokenization over 20 months as evidence that the shift is already accelerating.

title: Strategy Trading Explodes to Highest in a Year as Shares Fall on Dollar Reserve, Profit Forecast
contentSnippet: Trading volume in Strategy shares surged to 42.9 million, the most since last December, as the price fell 3.25%.

title: Anthropic Research Shows AI Agents Are Closing In on Real DeFi Attack Capability
contentSnippet: Models tested by MATS and the Anthropic Fellows program generated turnkey exploit scripts and identified fresh vulnerabilities, suggesting automated exploitation is becoming technically and economical

title: AI agents pose immediate threat to smart contract security, Anthropic says
contentSnippet: AI company Anthropic reported that automated AI agents successfully exploited a large portion of smart contracts in a mock set-up.

title: Unlimit Debuts Stable.com, a Decentralized Clearing House Built for Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The new non-custodial platform brings stablecoin swaps and global fiat off-ramps into one place, aiming to make the process more seamless for users.

title: XRP, Bitcoin on the Edge; Will Santa Abandon Nasdaq?
contentSnippet: XRP and BTC trade close to make-or-break levels while Nasdaq's November price action raises pullback risks.

title: Ethereum Devs Push ZK ‘Secret Santa’ System Toward Deployment
contentSnippet: The proposed protocol uses zero-knowledge proofs to verify sender–receiver relationships without revealing identities.

title: Grayscale predicts new bitcoin highs in 2026, dismisses 4-year cycle view
contentSnippet: Grayscale Research said bitcoin could hit new highs in 2026, countering concerns that it's heading into a long, deep downturn.

title: BlackRock's Fink and Goldstein Say Tokenization Could Redraw Market Plumbing
contentSnippet: BlackRock execs say tokenization, once tangled in the crypto frenzy, is accelerating toward a major rebuild of global market infrastructure.

title: Here's Where Analysts Say Bitcoin Could Be Headed Next For the Rest of 2025
contentSnippet: Analysts see Bitcoin range-bound near $90K into year-end before a potential 2026 rally to $135K, contingent on Fed policy.

title: South Korea’s ruling party issues ultimatum on stalled stablecoin bill: report
contentSnippet: Legislative efforts gained momentum as South Korean President Lee made developing a Korean won-stablecoin market one of his key initiatives.

title: Cantor Fitzgerald Reveals Solana ETF Holdings in Latest Filing to SEC
contentSnippet: Cantor disclosed its first position in a newly listed Solana ETF, adding momentum to TradFi's shift toward regulated crypto exposure.

title: Frontier AI Models Demonstrate Human-Level Capability in Smart Contract Exploits
contentSnippet: New analysis showed models including Claude Opus and GPT-5 uncovered millions in simulated vulnerabilities across blockchains.

title: China's Z-Image Dethrones Flux as King of AI Art—And Your Potato PC Can Run It
contentSnippet: The six-billion-parameter model is beating Flux2 on hardware from 2019, and the open-source community is going wild.

title: US FDIC to propose GENIUS Act implementation framework this month
contentSnippet: The FDIC chief said it will supervise and license subsidiaries of FDIC-supervised institutions that seek to issue stablecoins.

title: Changpeng Zhao, YZi Labs Seek Shakeup at BNB Treasury Firm After Stock Craters
contentSnippet: Binance co-founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao and YZi Labs are seeking a management overhaul at publicly traded BNB treasury, CEA Industries.

title: Vanguard clients can trade funds holding crypto like Bitcoin, XRP and Solana starting this week: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Vanguard's platform services more than "50 million brokerage customers" who manage "over $11 trillion," Bloomberg said.

title: 'Mad Cow Disease': Grand Theft Auto Dev Warns That Generative AI Could Harm Games
contentSnippet: Famed GTA developer Dan Houser said models trained on synthetic data could degrade game quality as creators rapidly adopt AI tools.

title: Vanguard to Allow Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP ETF Trading in Major Crypto Pivot
contentSnippet: Vanguard will allow trading of crypto-focused ETFs and mutual funds on its brokerage platform, ending years of resistance.

title: Yearn recovers $2.4 million in stolen assets stemming from ‘unchecked arithmetic’ bug
contentSnippet: Yearn Finance lost about $9 million in an exploit on Sunday, after an attacker was able to mint a near-infinite amount of yETH tokens.

title: First Chainlink ETF set to begin trading on Tuesday as exchange signs off on Grayscale’s LINK fund
contentSnippet: The first exchange-traded fund tracking Chainlink is set to begin trading on Tuesday on the New York Stock Exchange.

title: Kalshi tokenizes ‘thousands’ of its prediction markets using Solana
contentSnippet: Kalshi has tapped Solana to move its prediction markets onchain and enable permissionless monetization of its "global liquidity pool."

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
